analysis.description: ETHRoyale.isNotContract (/unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

ETHRoyale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol#133-190) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- accountBalance[_owner] == _amount || accountBalance[_owner] - _amount < 10000000000000000
_devFee in ETHRoyale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol#134) is a local variable never initialiazed

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of ETHRoyale.collectInterest (/unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol#113) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ETHRoyale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/30/0xc4f4be28e8cb75b7bf30808bc5523d22a9ac3665.sol#133) is not in mixedCase
